mewa shuddha wasthra wana bawin, eewa lagatha yuththe jalasnanaya kala pasuwa ya. 5 mulu ishrayel janaya ohuta papa pujawak sandaha eluwan dedeneku da dawana yaga pujawak sandaha eka bataluweku da diya yuthu ya. 6 aaron thama udesa pudana papa pujawe gon wassa oppu kota, thama udesath, thamage gruhaye wasiyan udesath paw kama kirime piliwetha itu kala yuthu ya. 7 ohu eluwan dedena gena sammukha mandapaye dorakada samindanan wahanse idiriyehi piliganwiya yuthu ya. 8 inpasu ohu samindanan wahanseta ekeku da ashashelta hewath kanthara yakshayata ekeku da washayen thoraganima sandaha, eluwan dedenata dadu damiya yuthu ya. 9 aaron samindanan wahanseta pidimata daduwa watuna eluwa gena, papa pujawak sandaha uu pidiya yuthu ya. 10 eheth, ashashelta dimata dadu watunu eluwa, panapitin ma samindanan wahanseta idiripath kota, paw kamawa labaganima sandaha uuta palukarayata yamata ida hariya yuthu ya. 11 ‚Äùinpasu aaron thama udesa pudana papa pujawe gon wassa gena thama udesa da gedara wasiyan udesa da paw kamawe piliwetha itu kara uu mariya yuthu ya. 12 ohu samindanan wahanse idiriyehi pujasanayen dalwena gini anguru gena dum bandunak purawa, hondata kudu kala suwanda drawya ahuru dekak da gena, thiraya pitupasata pamina 13 un wahanse idiriyehi suwanda dum walakulakin giwisum karanduwa uda athi karunasanaya wasena pinisa gini anguru matha suwanda drawya damiya yuthu ya.
